a.n: Les Pouvoirs Extraordinaires Du Corps Humain

p.d: Memory, stress, concentration: how to stimulate our brain? Adriana Karembeu and Michel Cymes decipher the extraordinary powers of the only irreplaceable organ in our body. How does our memory function? How can we improve our capacity to memorise? Which specialist to consult when problems arise? They also assess their ability to concentrate, essential for an efficient brain. Presented by: Michel Cymes, Adriana Karembeu.
